translation:
Dear Bernardina

I am sending you this letter through the bearer to give you news of myself, that I enjoy health, despite some spiritual discomforts, etc., and I hope that you and our children enjoy that precious good.

Send those letters and send me the replies.

Give my regards to the relatives in general, embrace our children for me, and receive the heart of your Almeida. Piratini, June 22, 1837.

Mrs. Bernardina Barcelos de Almeida. At the house of Mr. Luís Vieira, in Chuí.
